translations: 发芽，生长；形成（germinate 的过去式和过去分词）
使发芽，使生长（germinate 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: This paper introduces the multiple products of rice such as parboiled rice, germinated rice, enriched rice, germinated brown rice and blood-sugar-reducing rice etc;
sentences.translation: 介绍了多元化的稻米产品，如蒸谷米、胚芽米、营养强化米、 发芽糙米、降血糖大米等；

sentences.sentence: Striding into the new century, "intermediary thought" germinated by human being's multi culture dialogue will become the thought basis of comparative literature study.
sentences.translation: 进入新世纪以来，人类通过多元化对话而萌生的“间性思维”，可以成为比较文学研究的思维基础。

sentences.sentence: According to the production practice, the infection of X. furcata occurred during the casing period when X. furcata spores dropped on the casing and germinated at hig…
sentences.translation: 结合生产实践推断，叉状炭角菌的侵染发生在覆土期，侵染源来自空气中的孢子，其萌发与鸡腿蘑菌圃的温度有关。
